description.english: Start your day fresh!
description.german: Starte frisch in den Tag!
description.french: Commence la journée fraîche !
description.italian: Inizia bene la tua giornata!
description.spanish: ¡Comienza tu día fresco!
description.japanese: さあ一日の始まりだ！

description.english: Avoid detection from all the Techno Grunts.
description.german: Werde von keinem der Techno Grunts entdeckt.
description.french: Évite d'être détecté des tous les Techno Grunts.
description.italian: Non farti trovare dai Techno Grunt.
description.spanish: Evita la detención de todos los Techno Grunts.
description.japanese: テクノの部下に見つからないように。

displayName.japanese: ジャンプ・ジャンプ・スライド・スライド

description.english: Leap over every canister as you slide down the chute.
description.german: Springe beim Runterrutschen der Bahn über jeden Kanister.
description.french: Saute au-dessus de chaque bombe lorsque tu glisses sur la chute.
description.italian: Salta sopra ogni contenitore scivolando giù in fondo.
description.spanish: Salta por encima de cada frasco mientras te deslizas por el tobogán.
description.japanese: シュートを下へスライドして缶の上を飛び越えよう。

description.english: Climb Tassel Tower at record speed.
description.german: Erklimme den Tassel-Turm in Rekordgeschwindigkeit.
description.french: Escalade Tassel Tower à toute vitesse.
description.italian: Scala la Tassel Tower a una velocità record.
description.spanish: Escala la Torre Tassel a velocidad récord.
description.japanese: タッセル・タワーを最高記録速度で登ろう。

description.english: Eliminate the competition.
description.german: Eliminiere die Konkurrenz.
description.french: Élimine la concurrence.
description.italian: Elimina la concorrenza.
description.spanish: Elimina la competición.
description.japanese: 試合を消す

displayName.japanese: マジックカーペットライド

description.english: Reach the end of the race without falling off your carpet!
description.german: Erreiche das Ende des Rennens, ohne vom Teppich herunterzufallen!
description.french: Va jusqu'au bout de la course sans tomber de ton tapis !
description.italian: Termina la gara senza cadere dal tuo tappeto!
description.spanish: ¡Alcanza el final de la carrera sin caerte de tu alfombra!
description.japanese: カーペットから落ちないようにゴールまでたどり着こう！

description.english: Finish building the Dynamo.
description.german: Stelle den Dynamo fertig.
description.french: Termine de monter la Dynamo
description.italian: Completa l'assemblamento della Dinamo.
description.spanish: Termina de construir la Dinamita.
description.japanese: ダイナモを完成させる。

description.english: Gather up as many friends as possible for a swim!
description.german: Versammle so viele Freunde wie möglich, um zu schwimmen!
description.french: Rassemble autant d'amis que possible pour nager !
description.italian: Raggruppa il maggior numero di amici per una nuotata!
description.spanish: ¡Reúne tantos amigos como puedas para nadar!
description.japanese: 友達をできるだけ多く集めて泳ごう！

description.english: Avoid all the gears during the escape slide.
description.german: Weiche auf deiner Flucht allen Zahnrädern aus!
description.french: Évite tout le matos lorsque tu t'échappes !
description.italian: Evita tutti gli ingranaggi durante la tua fuga!
description.spanish: ¡Evita todos los engranajes mientras haces tu huida!
description.japanese: 脱出中にギアを避けろ！

displayName.japanese: ガーディアン・ジーニー

description.english: Beat the game.
description.german: Beende das Spiel.
description.french: Gagne la partie.
description.italian: Completa il gioco.
description.spanish: Bate el juego.
description.japanese: ゲームを制覇。

displayName.japanese: ハーフジーニーは英雄！

description.english: Achieve 100% completion!
description.german: Erreiche 100% Komplettierung!
description.french: Termine le jeu à 100 % !
description.italian: Completa tutto al 100%!
description.spanish: ¡Logra completar el 100%!
description.japanese: 100%での完了を達成しよう！

description.english: Obtain all magic forms!
description.german: Besorge dir alle Magieformen!
description.french: Obtiens toutes les formes magiques !
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le forme magiche!
description.spanish: ¡Obtén todas las formas mágicas!
description.japanese: 魔法の技を全部習得しよう！

description.english: Obtain any magic relic.
description.german: Besorge dir irgendein ma Relikt.
description.french: Obtiens n'importe quelle relique magique.
description.italian: Ottieni qualsiasi reliquia magica.
description.spanish: Obtén cualquier reliquia mágica.
description.japanese: 魔法のレリックを手に入れよう。

description.english: Obtain half of the magic relics.
description.german: Besorge dir die Hälfte aller Magie-Relikte.
description.french: Obtiens la moitié des reliques magiques.
description.italian: Ottieni metà delle forme magiche!
description.spanish: Obtén la mitad de las reliquias mágicas.
description.japanese: 魔法のレリックの半分を手に入れよう。

description.english: Obtain all magic relics!
description.german: Besorge dir alle Magie-Relikte.
description.french: Obtiens toutes les reliques magiques !
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le reliquie magiche.
description.spanish: ¡Obtén todas las reliquias mágicas!
description.japanese: 魔法のレリックを全て手に入れよう！

description.english: Unlock any door in the Art Gallery.
description.german: Entriegele irgendeine Tür in der Kunstgalerie.
description.french: Déverrouile n'importe quelle porte de la galerie d'art
description.italian: Sblocca una qualsiasi porta alla Galleria d'Arte.
description.spanish: Desbloquea cualquier puerta de la Galería de Arte.
description.japanese: アートギャラリーでドアをアンロックしよう。

description.english: Unlock half the doors in the Art Gallery.
description.german: Entriegele die Hälfte der Türen in der Kunstgalerie.
description.french: Déverrouille la moitié des portes de la galerie d'art.
description.italian: Sblocca metà delle porte alla Galleria d'Arte.
description.spanish: Desbloquea la mitad de las pueras de la Galería de Arte.
description.japanese: アートギャラリーでドアを半分アンロックしよう。

description.english: Unlock all the doors in the Art Gallery.
description.german: Entriegele alle Türen in der Kunstgalerie.
description.french: Déverrouille toutes les portes de la galerie d'art.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le porte alla Galleria d'Arte.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las puertas de la Galería de Arte.
description.japanese: アートギャラリーで全部のドアをアンロックしよう。

displayName.german: Dir dreht man keinen Quatsch an.
displayName.french: Je ne te vends pas d'huile de serpent.
displayName.spanish: No te venden el aceite de serpiente.
displayName.japanese: インチキ薬は売ってません。

description.english: Make a deal with a sneaky, snakey seller of magical secrets.
description.german: Mache Geschäfte mit einem schleichenden, schlängelnden Händler magischer Geheimnisse.
description.french: Fais des affaires avec un vendeur serpent siffleur vendeur de secrets magiques.
description.italian: Trova un accordo con la furba serpentona, venditrice di segreti magici.
description.spanish: Haz un trato con un vendedor escurridizo de secretos mágicos.
description.japanese: ずる賢い秘密の魔法のセールスマンと交渉しよう。

description.english: Defeat a Bonelegs enemy as a Spider.
description.german: Besiege einen Bonelegs-Gegner als Spinne.
description.french: Combats un ennemi Bonelegs en tant qu'araignée.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Bonelegs, il ragno nemico.
description.spanish: Derrota un enemigo Bonelegs como una Araña.
description.japanese: クモの姿でボーンレッグを倒せ。

description.english: Crush an enemy with a block.
description.german: Zerquetsche einen Gegner mit einem Block.
description.french: Écrase un ennemi avec un bloc.
description.italian: Schiaccia un nemico con un blocco.
description.spanish: Tritura un enemigo con un bloque.
description.japanese: ブロックで敵を潰そう。

description.english: Reflect 5 attacks back at an enemy with the Mirror.
description.german: Reflektiere mit dem Spiegel 5 Attacken auf den Gegner zurück.
description.french: Renvoie 5 attaques à un ennemi à l'aide d'un miroir.
description.italian: Rimanda indietro 5 attacchi al nemico con l'aiuto dello Specchio.
description.spanish: Refleja 5 ataques de vuelta al enemigo con el Espejo.
description.japanese: 鏡を使って敵の攻撃を5回跳ね返せ。

description.english: Smash 10 skeletons with the Elephant.
description.german: Zerschmettere 10 Skelette mit dem Elefant.
description.french: Fais éclater 10 squelettes avec l'Éléphant.
description.italian: Spacca 10 scheletri con l'Elefante.
description.spanish: Aplasta 10 esqueletos con el Elefante.
description.japanese: ゾウの姿でガイコツを10体潰そう。

description.english: Defeat 10 enemies using a Fireball.
description.german: Besiege 10 Gegner mit einem Feuerball.
description.french: Écrase 10 ennemis en utilisant une boule de feu.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 nemici usando la Palla di Fuoco.
description.spanish: Derrota a 10 enemigos usando una Bola de Fuego.
description.japanese: ファイアボールを使って敵を10匹倒そう。

description.english: Defeat 20 enemies with Lightning.
description.german: Besiege 20 Gegner mit Blitzen.
description.french: Bats 20 ennemis avec des éclairs.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 20 nemici con il Fulmine.
description.spanish: Derrota a 20 enemigos con Relámpago.
description.japanese: 雷で敵を20匹倒そう。

displayName.japanese: そんな風によばないで！

description.english: Defeat P.O.O.P. T.O.O.T.
description.german: Besiege P.O.O.P. T.O.O.T.
description.french: Bats L.O.L.O.
description.italian: Sconfiggi T.O.P.O. T.O.P.O.
description.spanish: Vence a P.O.C.O. T.O.C.O.
description.japanese: パーパーティンカースラグをかわせ

description.english: Free the missing maidens!
description.german: Befreie die vermissten Jungfrauen!
description.french: Libère les jeunes filles manquantes !
description.italian: Libera le fanciulle scomparse!
description.spanish: ¡Libera a las doncellas perdidas!
description.japanese: 少女たちを解放しよう!

description.english: Discover the history of Tassel Town's brightest star.
description.german: Entdecke die Geschichte von Tassel Towns hellstem Stern.
description.french: Découvre l'histoire de l'étoile la plus brillante de Tassel Town.
description.italian: Scopri la storia della stella più brillante di Tassel Town.
description.spanish: Descubre la historia de la estrella más brillante de Tassel Town.
description.japanese: タッセル・タウン史上一番のスターを見つけ出そう。

description.english: Sometimes two are better than one... but not this time!
description.german: Manchmal sind zwei besser als einer... Aber nicht diesmal!
description.french: Quelquefois deux vaut mieux qu'un… mais pas cette fois-ci.
description.italian: A volte due è meglio di uno... ma non questa volta!
description.spanish: Algunas veces dos es mejor que uno… ¡pero no esta vez!
description.japanese: 一つより二つの方がいいときもあるけど、今回は違う！

description.english: Foil the heist in Cape Crustacean.
description.german: Vereitele den Raub in Cape Crustacean.
description.french: Déjoue le cambriolage à Cape Crustacean
description.italian: Sventa il colpo a Cape Crustacean.
description.spanish: Impide el atraco al Cape Crustacean
description.japanese: ケープ・クラステーシャンで強盗を阻止しよう。

displayName.english: Shantae versus the Important Squid Baron
displayName.german: Shantae gegen den bedeutenden Squid Baron
displayName.spanish: Shantae contra el Importante Squid Baron
displayName.japanese: シャンティ vs 大事なスクイッド・バロン

description.english: It'd sell like buns.
description.german: Weggehen wie warme Semmeln.
description.french: Ça se vendrait comme des petits pains.
description.italian: Venderebbe come il pane.
description.spanish: Esto se vendería como rosquillas.
description.japanese: バカ売れ。

description.english: Thwarted the Queen of the Seven Seas.
description.german: Du hast die Königin der Sieben Weltmeere ausgebremst.
description.french: Repousse la Reine des Sept Mers.
description.italian: Regina dei Sette Mari Bloccata
description.spanish: Desbarata a la Reina de los Siete
description.japanese: 7つの海を制する女王を阻止した。

description.english: Put a stop to the mechanized madness!
description.german: Stoppe die mechanische Festung!
description.french: Fais arrêter la folie mécanique !
description.italian: Ferma la pazzia meccanica!
description.spanish: ¡Frena la locura mecanizada!
description.japanese: 機械化された狂気を止めろ！

description.english: Obtained the Magnet
description.german: Du hast den Magnet erhalten
description.french: A obtenu l'aimant
description.italian: Magnete trovato
description.spanish: Obtuviste el Imán
description.japanese: 磁石を見つけた

description.english: Obtained Copper Ore
description.german: Du hast das Kupfererz erhalten
description.french: A obtenu du minerai de cuivre
description.italian: Rame Grezzo trovato
description.spanish: Obtuviste Mineral de Cobre
description.japanese: 銅鉱石を手に入れた

description.english: Obtained the Dark Shard
description.german: Du hast den Dunklen Splitter erhalten

description.spanish: Obtuviste el Cristal Negro
description.japanese: 闇のかけらを手に入れた

description.english: Obtained the Light Shard
description.german: Du hast den Lichtsplitter erhalten

description.italian: Cristallo Bianco trovato
description.spanish: Obtuviste el Cristal Blanco
description.japanese: 光のかけらを手に入れた

description.english: Obtained the Zombie Hamster and Iron Slab
description.german: Finde den Zombie-Hamster und die Eisenplatte.
description.french: Hamster Zombie et Bloc de Fer acquis
description.italian: Criceto Zombie e Lastra di Ferro trovati
description.spanish: Conseguido el Hámster Zombi y la Losa de Hierro
description.japanese: ゾンビ・ハムスターと鉄板を手に入れた

displayName.italian: Chi lo trova se lo tiene
displayName.spanish: El primero en encontrarlo se lo queda.

description.english: Collect all of Risky's personal possessions.
description.german: Sammle alle von Riskys persönlichen Gegenständen.
description.french: Procurez-vous tous les effets personnels de Risky.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli effetti personali di Risky
description.spanish: Acumula todas las posesiones personales de Risky.
description.japanese: リスキィの持ち物を全部集めよう

description.english: Defeat Risky Boots as a mouse.
description.german: Besiege Risky Boots als Maus.
description.french: Battre Risky Boots sous la forme d’une Souris.
description.italian: Trasformata in Topo, sconfiggi Risky Boots
description.spanish: Derrota a Risky Boots como un Ratón.
description.japanese: ネズミの姿でリスキィ・ブーツを倒せ

description.english: Saved the day as fast as possible!
description.german: Du hast die Lage so schnell wie möglich gerettet!
description.french: A sauvé la journée aussi vite que possible !
description.italian: Situazione salvata il prima possibile!
description.spanish: ¡Guardó el día tan rápido como pudo!
description.japanese: 一刻も早く状況をたて直せ！

description.english: Achieve 100% completion as fast as possible!
description.german: Erreiche so schnell wie möglich 100% Komplettierung!
description.french: Remplis ta mission à 100 % aussi vite que possible !
description.italian: Completa al 100% il prima possibile!
description.spanish: ¡Logra completar el 100% tan rápido como puedas!
description.japanese: できるだけ早く100%での完了を達成しよう！

displayName.japanese: オールドスクール、ベイビー！

description.english: Complete Hard Core Mode, and show it what's what.
description.german: Kompletten Hardcore-Modus, und zeigen, was ist was.
description.french: Complétez le mode Hard Core, et montrez-lui ce qui est quoi.
description.italian: Completa la modalità Hard Core, e mostrare come stanno le cose.
description.spanish: Complete el modo de núcleo duro y muéstrelo qué es lo que.
description.japanese: ハードコアモードを完了し、何を表示しますか？

description.english: Collect your first component in Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.german: Sammle deinen ersten Teil in Pirate Queen's Quest.

description.spanish: Recoger tu primer componente en Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.japanese: Pirate Queen's Questまでに最初の部品を入手

description.english: Collect all Dark Magic in Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.german: Sammle alle Verfluchte Magie in Pirate Queen's Quest.

description.italian: Raccogli tutte le Magie Maledette in Pirate Queen's Quest.

description.japanese: Pirate Queen's Questまでに全ての呪いの魔法を集める

description.english: Collect all Genie Crystals in Pirate Queen's Quest.

description.spanish: Recoger todas los Cristales de Genio en Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.japanese: Pirate Queen's Questまでに全てのジーニークリスタルを集める

description.english: Defeat that Half-Genie brat in Pirate Queen's Quest!
description.german: Besiege diese Halb-Djinn Göre in Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.french: Battre la gamine demi-génie dans Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.italian: Sconfiggi quel Mezzo-Genio di monella in Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.spanish: Derrotar a la niñata Medio Genio en Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.japanese: Pirate Queen's Questまでにあのハーフジーニーの小娘を倒す

description.english: Obtain all win screens of Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.german: Erhalten Sie alle Win-Screens von Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.french: Obtenez tous les écrans gagnants de Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.italian: Ottenere tutti gli schermi di win di Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.spanish: Obtener todas las pantallas de triunfo de Pirate Queen's Quest.
description.japanese: Pirate Queen's Questのすべての勝利スクリーンを得る。

description.english: Relive a past event in Friends to the End.
description.german: Erlebe ein vergangenes Ereignis in Freunde bis zum Ende.
description.french: Revivez un événement passé dans Friends to the End.
description.italian: Rivivi un evento passato in Amici fino alla Fine.
description.spanish: Revive un evento del pasado en Amigos hasta el final.
description.japanese: ずっと友達で過ぎた出来事を追体験する。

description.english: Keep one of Sky's attack birds in flight for a full 60 seconds in Friends to the End.
description.german: Halte einen der Angriffsvögel von Sky für volle 60 Sekunden in der Luft in Friends to the End.
description.french: Maintenez une des attaques d'oiseaux en vol de Sky pendant 60 secondes dans Friends to the End.
description.italian: Mantieni in volo uno degli uccelli di attacco di Sky per un totale di 60 secondi in Amici fino alla Fine.
description.spanish: Mantén a uno de los pájaros de ataque de Sky en el aire durante 60 segundos en Amigos hasta el final.
description.japanese: ずっと友達でスカイのアタックバードの1羽を60秒飛ばす。

displayName.italian: Così si usa la tua testa!
displayName.japanese: それでこそ頭を使ってる！

description.english: Defeat 10 enemies with Rotty's head throw in Friends to the End.
description.german: Besiege 10 Gegner mit Rottys Kopfwurf in Friends to the End.
description.french: Battez 10 ennemis avec la tête de Rotty dans Friends to the End.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 nemici con il lancio della testa di Rotty in Amici fino alla Fine.
description.spanish: Derrota a 10 enemigos lanzando la cabeza de Rotty en Amigos hasta el final.
description.japanese: ずっと友達でロッティの頭投げを使って敵を10対倒す。

description.english: Defeat 20 enemies with Bolo's grapple attack in Friends to the End.
description.german: Besiege 20 Gegner mit Bolos Greiferangriff in Friends to the End.
description.french: Battez 20 ennemis avec l'attaque de Bolo dans Friends to the End.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 20 nemici col combattimento attaccante di Bolo in Amici fino alla Fine.
description.spanish: Derrota a 20 enemigos con el ataque de garra de Bolo en Amigos hasta el final.
description.japanese: ずっと友達でボロの引っ掛け攻撃を使って敵を20体倒す。

description.english: Collect all Dream Squids in Friends to the End.
description.german: Sammle alle Traum-Tintenfische in Friends to the End.
description.french: Rassemblez tous les Rêves de calmar dans Friends to the End.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i Calamari da Sogno in Amici fino alla Fine.
description.spanish: Recoge todos los Calamares de Sueños en Amigos hasta el final.
description.japanese: ずっと友達で夢スクイッドを全て集める。

description.english: Save an ally with the power of friendship in Friends to the End.
description.german: Rette einen Verbündeten mit der Macht der Freundschaft in Friends to the End.
description.french: Sauvez un allié grâce au pouvoir de l'amitié dans Friends to the End.
description.italian: Salva un alleato usando il potere dell'amicizia in Amici fino alla Fine.
description.spanish: Salva a un aliado con el poder de la amistad en Amigos hasta el final.
description.japanese: ずっと友達で友情の力を使って味方を1人助ける。

description.english: Obtain all win screens of Friends to the End.
description.german: Erhalte alle Win-Screens von Friends to the End.
description.french: Obtenez tous les écrans de victoire de Friends to the End.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli schermi vincenti di Amici fino alla Fine.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las pantallas de victoria en Amigos hasta el final.
description.japanese: ずっと友達で勝利画面を全て入手。

description.english: Defeat 50 enemies using switch blocks.
description.german: Besiege 50 Feinde mit Schalterblöcken.
description.french: Battez 50 ennemis en utilisant des commutateurs.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 50 nemici usando i blocchi da interruttore.
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a 50 enemigos usando cambio de bloques!
description.japanese: スイッチブロックを使って敵を50体倒す。

description.english: Use the teleport ability 100 times.
description.german: Benutze die Teleportierfähigkeit 100 Mal.
description.french: Utilisez l'aptitude de téléportation 100 fois.
description.italian: Usa l'abilità di teletrasporto 100 volte.
description.spanish: ¡Usa la habilidad de teletransporte 100 veces!
description.japanese: テレポートを100回使う。

displayName.japanese: サンプロテクションファクター 250

description.english: Collect 250 bottles of sunscreen.
description.german: Sammle 250 Flaschen Sonnencreme.
description.french: Collectez 250 bouteilles de crème solaire.
description.italian: Raccogli 250 bottiglie di crema solare.
description.spanish: ¡Recoge 250 botellas de protector solar!
description.japanese: 日焼け止めを250本集める。

description.english: Complete a level wearing every costume!
description.german: Beende ein Level in jedem Kostüm!
description.french: Terminez un niveau avec tous les costumes !
description.italian: Completa un livello indossando ogni costume!
description.spanish: ¡Completa un nivel llevando cada traje!
description.japanese: それぞれの衣装を身につけてレベルを１つクリア！

description.english: Complete the game Officer Mode.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Officer-Modus ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Officier.
description.italian: Completa il gioco tramite la Modalità da Ufficiale.
description.spanish: ¡Completa el juego en el Modo Agente!
description.japanese: 警部モードでゲームをクリアしよう。

description.english: Obtain all win screens in Officer Mode.
description.german: Erhalte alle Gewinner-Bildschirme im Officer-Modus.
description.french: Obtenez tous les écrans de victoire en mode Officier.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le schermate di vittoria in Modalità da Ufficiale.
description.spanish: ¡Consigue todas las pantallas de victoria en el Modo Agente!
description.japanese: 警部モードで勝利のスクリーンを全て入手。

description.spanish: ¡Completa el juego en el Modo Ninja!
description.japanese: 忍者モードでゲームをクリアしよう。

description.english: Obtain all win screens in Ninja Mode.

description.french: Obtenez tous les écrans de victoire en mode Ninja.

description.spanish: ¡Consigue todas las pantallas de victoria en el Modo Ninja!
description.japanese: 忍者モードで勝利のスクリーンを全て入手。

description.italian: Completa il gioco in Modalità Spiaggia.
description.spanish: ¡Completa el juego en el Modo Playa!
description.japanese: 浜辺モードでゲームをクリアしよう。
